original_text: And it shall come to pass, that as the Lord rejoiced over you to do you good, and to multiply you; so the Lord will rejoice over you to destroy you, and to bring you to nought; and ye shall be plucked from off the land whither thou goest to possess it.
korean_text: 여호와께서 너희에게 선을 행하시고 너희를 번성하게 하시기를 기뻐하시던 것 같이 이제는 여호와께서 너희를 망하게 하시며 멸하시기를 기뻐하시리니 너희가 들어가 차지할 땅에서 뽑힐 것이요

sentences.original_text: And it shall come to pass
that as the Lord rejoiced over you
so the Lord will rejoice over you
and to bring you to nought
and ye shall be plucked from off the land
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 그 땅에서 뽑혀 나갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: whither thou goest to possess it
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 소유하기 위해 들어간 바로 그 땅에서
